summary.overallFindings: The Walt Disney Company demonstrates comprehensive responsible AI practices across all seven pillars, with detailed public evidence of transparency, fairness, explainability, oversight, privacy, governance, and external commitments. The company has established formal structures, published governance frameworks, and taken proactive steps in both internal and external accountability. No significant gaps were identified, indicating a strong and mature approach to responsible AI.
